Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.jmx.mbeans

All the MBeans interface used in C-JDBC

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AbstractLoadBalancerMBean This class defines a AbstractLoadBalancerMBean
ControllerMBean JMX Interface of the C-JDBC Controller.
DatabaseBackendMBean MBeanInterface to the DatabaseBackend
DataCollectorMBean DataCollector interface to used via JMX.
RequestManagerMBean This class defines a RequestManagerMBean
VirtualDatabaseMBean JMX Interface to remotely manage a Virtual Databases.
 

Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.jmx.mbeans Description

All the MBeans interface used in C-JDBC
